radiographic_examinations.findings: The gallbladder is contracted with wall edema. Multiple gallstones within the gallbladder. Post-contrast subtle enhancement surrounding the gallbladder consistent with hyperemia. The biliary tree is normal, with no filling defects or dilatation. The liver is normal with no focal lesions. Patent portal and hepatic veins; normal hepatic artery anatomy. Pancreas divisum noted, otherwise unremarkable pancreas with normal pancreatic duct caliber. The kidneys, adrenals, and spleen are normal. Visualized bowel is unremarkable. Lung bases are clear, with normal bone marrow signal and no destructive osseous lesions.
